name: reduce_electric_equipment_loads_by_percentage
display_name: Reduce Electric Equipment Loads by Percentage

arguments.name: space_type
arguments.display_name: Apply the Measure to a Specific Space Type or to the Entire Model

arguments.name: material_and_installation_cost
arguments.display_name: Increase in Material and Installation Cost for Electric Equipment per Floor Area

arguments.name: demolition_cost
arguments.display_name: Increase in Demolition Costs for Electric Equipment per Floor Area

arguments.name: demo_cost_initial_const
arguments.display_name: Demolition Costs Occur During Initial Construction

arguments.name: om_cost
arguments.display_name: Increase O & M Costs for Electric Equipment per Floor Area

name_xml: Reduce Electric Equipment Loads by Percentage
modeler_description_xml: Loop through all electric equipment objects in the specified space type or the entire building. Clone the definition if it has not already been cloned, rename and adjust the power based on the specified percentage. Link the new definition to the existing electric equipment instance. Loop through objects first in space types and then in spaces, but only for spaces that are in the specified space type, unless entire building has been chosen.
description_xml: Reduce electric equipment loads. This will affect equipment that have a, power, power per area (LPD), or power per person value. This can be applied to the entire building or a specific space type. A positive percentage represents an increase electric equipment power, while a negative percentage can be used for an increase in electric equipment power.
